snippet: An explosion killed between 40 and 65 people at a workshop in an eastern Chinese city, China state media reported.
abstract: China state media reports explosion kills between 40 and 65 people at a car polishing workshop in eastern Chinese city of Kunshan.
lead_paragraph: An explosion killed between 40 and 65 people at a workshop in an eastern Chinese city, China state media reported.

headline.main: China: Blast at Work Site Kills Dozens
headline.print_headline: China: Blast at Work Site Kills Dozens
